hint: Push filters to earliest possible point, use explicit JOIN syntax, and pre-filter dimension tables before joining with fact tables.
Restructure CTEs to pre-filter dimensions and facts, use MATERIALIZED CTEs where beneficial, and isolate selective date filters.
Pre-filter all dimension and fact tables into materialized CTEs, then restructure the self-join pattern to compute aggregations once.
Transform the self-join pattern using window functions or pivot techniques, and pre-aggregate data to avoid repeated CTE scans.
